Method.name: OnPage

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // Подготовка данных для вывода в отчете

Method.name: GetData
Method.Implementation: s res="" // Проверка входных параметров // ID // Инициализация данных s Parameters("Value","laDriversLicenseSeries")=" " s Parameters("Value","laDriversLicenseNumber")=" " s Parameters("Value","laDriversLicenseIssue")=" " s Parameters("Value","laDriversLicenseDateIssue")=" " s Parameters("Value","laForeignPassportSeries")=" " s Parameters("Value","laForeignPassportNumber")=" " s Parameters("Value","laForeignPassportIssue")=" " s Parameters("Value","laForeignPassportDateIssue")=" " s Parameters("Value","laMilitaryPassportSeries")=" " s Parameters("Value","laMilitaryPassportNumber")=" " s Parameters("Value","laMilitaryPassportIssue")=" " s Parameters("Value","laMilitaryPassportDateIssue")=" " s Parameters("Value","laRegPhone")=" " s Parameters("Value","laFactPhone")=" " s Parameters("Value","laMarrtalBirthDay")=" " s Parameters("Value","laJobPhoneCity")=" " s Parameters("Value","laPFRNumber")=" " //для теста ID=27525420 s ID=$g(%request.Data("ID",1)) i ID="" q "Не задан ID класса Docs.LoanApp." s obj=##class(Docs.LoanApp).%OpenId(ID) i '$IsObject(obj) q "Не найдена заявка с ID="_ID_"." try { s res=..InitData(ID,.Parameters) } catch ex { s res="Параметры заявки не соответствуют ожидаемым в печатной форме." } q res

Method.name: InitData
